::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod neels down to Primal.
"You were out for about 20 minutes. You asked what I had with me that
was so powerful. I had the Maximal Matrix of Leasership. It was
finished, and givin to me before I came to this planet. It's wisdom
comes from the Elders, the Hell Beast had killed. When you were out you
seemed to be dreaming, care to talk about it?"
